about_the_game:
The Steampunk Asset Pack - HUD's is the latest pack from artist Mattepaintings.be. This time he's turned his attention to the world of Steampunk, creating over 300 hand-painted HUD assets for use in your games.

Fully compatible with the GameGuru MAX HUD editor and Ideal for Steampunk, Victorian or dystopian games, the assets provided allow you to create menus, game HUD's and add decoration to your storyboard screens. You'll find enough images to build impressive front-end screens, add compasses and radars, design custom HUD's for your custom global variables, make inventory, crafting and quest screens and much more.

In addition to all of this, the Steampunk Asset Pack - HUD's is compatible with all the other HUD packs which are available separately, allowing you to freely mix and match to create some truly impressive game elements.

You'll find enough images to build impressive front-end screens, add compasses and radars, design custom HUD's for your custom global variables, make inventory, crafting and quest screens and much more.

In addition to all of this, the Steampunk Asset Pack - HUD's is compatible with all the other HUD packs which are available separately, allowing you to freely mix and match to create some truly impressive game elements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Opteron 4274 HE, or better.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 Fury, with 4 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K | AMD 3700X, or better.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
